name: Sublime Text
description: Sublime Text is a trial-based text editor, it has many features including quick search, command palette, simultaneous editing, python-based plugin APIs, etc. It is a cross-platform text editor compatible with Windows, Linux and macOS. It also has many display options for showing multiple files at once or displaying a single file and hiding all other options around it for a distraction free environment. It's initial release was 18 January 2008 and it's most stable and updated release was 8 July 2013. The program was written with C++ and Python.
